title: Mastering Communication and Public Speaking Skills
headline: Learn to captivate your audience and become an effective communicator and public speaker with this free online course.
description: We live in a world where good communication techniques and public speaking skills decide how effective and successful you can be. Unfortunately, most people suffer from anxiety or fear of speaking in public or in videos. This course provides tips to address these areas and improve your communication and public speaking skills. Be an immersive communicator and effective presenter and charm your audience to believe what you do.

courseDescription:
Do you want to captivate your audience and win them over by conveying your message effectively? Has it always been a challenge for you to be comfortable, confident and relaxed when speaking publicly or giving simple presentations? Most people struggle with their communication and public speaking skills due to anxiety or fear. Now is your chance to move ahead from that crowd by eliminating your apprehension. World-class public speaker, trainer, bestselling author and communications expert TJ Walker will guide you in mastering this art.

This course has been divided into interactive lessons and will help you become a better orator. You will learn all the tested techniques to become more confident, relaxed and motivated to convince and win over your audience. In addition, the tutorials will guide you in engaging your colleagues using PowerPoint and ethical cheat sheets. It will also teach you to tell stories, use images and slides to enhance them and receive feedback each time you use them. As a bonus, you’ll even learn to create amazing inexpensive talking videos to impress audiences for a lifetime.

Presentation and public speaking skills are the most important personal skills which help in every field of corporate, government and civic life. This course is a stimulating and thought-provoking masterpiece that will provide you with a wealth of practical knowledge and insights. You will receive in-depth training on every aspect of the presentation, public speaking, communication, storytelling, effective PowerPoint and camera skills. It is best suited for a beginner who wants to become an influential communicator and public speaker, an experienced businessperson who wants to win over their business prospects or anybody who wants to be a persuasive presenter. So join the course now and achieve your goals.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn the techniques to be an effective communicator and public relations expert who is comfortable, confident, and relaxed. Understand simple, yet incredible tricks, techniques, and processes needed for successful communication and public speaking expert that can charm the audience to do what he or she wants them to do.
topics: Effective Communication and Public Speaking – Learning Outcomes
Effective Communication and Public Speaking - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Effective Presentation Skills and Use of Video Presentations
modules.description: Learn how to develop strong presentation skills and make the best use of videos. Understand the tricks, techniques, and tips to make an effective presentation in person or through video with your audience or business prospects. Learn about the benefits of making a video presentation and how, when, and where to use them successfully.
topics: Effective Presentation Skills & Use of Video  - Learning Outcomes
Effective Presentation Skills and Use of Video - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
topics: Mastering Communication and Public Speaking Skills Assessment

slides:
• Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module you will be able to:
    • Describe all the tips, tricks, and techniques needed to be an effective communicator and public speaker.
    • Explain how to look comfortable, confident, and relaxed in any speaking situation.
    • Recognize the steps and expressions required to charm the audience and gain their attention.
    • Explain the steps to improve yourself and motivate your audience.
    • Describe the process and techniques to prepare a memorable presentation.
    • Describe all the skills needed to motivate your audience to do what you want them to do.
    • Explain the importance of feedback and the correct way of taking feedback.

  • Public Speaking for Beginners

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Lesson Summary

    • Using a cheat sheet (single paper) with topics written in bold letters gives your audience an impression that you are confident, authoritative, and not just a beginner.
    • Blanking out your computer screen while speaking or during communication helps put the audience's focus on you. Verbal ticks like uh,  um, err, ya are unprofessional and present you as nervous.
    • Practicing with your cell phone recorder is the easiest and effective technique to improve your communication and public speaking skills.
    • The first step in preparing a presentation or communicating a message is to sort out the answer to this one question. What is the one thing you want your audience to do after you finished communication or speaking?
    • A good judgment separates a good speaker from a bad speaker.
    • The only way to improve is by asking for feedback from the listeners or people. The secret of getting feedback is not asking to rate on a 1 to 5 scale but asking the audience what they remember from the presentation.
    • Watch yourself giving a presentation on video, it is the no. 1 way to get over the fear and nervousness
      of public speaking and presentation and communication skills.
    • Instead of data dumping, you should zero on the five best messages beneficial to your audience.
    • Telling a story with the message makes the presentation more memorable. The difference between an awful speaker and a great speaker is that an awful speaker never tells a story.

  • Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module you will be able to:
    • Describe quick tips to improve your presentation skills.
    • Identify presentation techniques and tricks to use to influence audience or business prospects.
    • Recognize best PowerPoint presentation practices.
    • Explain how to make messages memorable to your audiences and prospects.
    • Describe the types of application, use, and advantages of a video presentation.
    • Explain how to make the best use of video presentations to influence your customers, audience, and business prospects through social media platforms, websites, and apps.
    • Explain how to move ahead of your competitors using simple talking head videos.

  • Presentation Skills for Beginners

  • YouTube Presence

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Lesson Summary

    • During a presentation, the audience is not going to remember mistakes but your reactions to your mistakes.
    • The most efficient way to practice presentation skills is to practice using your cell phone video recorder.
    • Sending a business video proposal is far more effective than a text document. A simple video presentation is far more powerful than a cold email text or a letter.
    • Talking head videos are one of the greatest tools for public relations and media attention.
    • Moving your head, eye, and face a great deal while speaking, moving your body and hands, having variety in your voice like speaking softly or loud, simple video background are some effective video creating techniques.
    •  Having a YouTube channel with continuous updates of new videos is a constant form of communication with clients prospects customers regularly.
    • For a company or organization having a video, a newsletter is far more effective and cheaper today than a text-based newsletter.
    • Facebook live is another great video option or huge opportunity for communicating live with your clients, prospects, followers, customers, community in a video format directly from anywhere.
    • Crisis communication and taking online courses or training are some of the important categories of using videos.
